title: I tend to wait until the last minute…
text: I tend to wait until the last minute and hate these types of complicated processes (I'm a bit of a world traveler and this isn't the first country I've gone through this process with). I would give 10 stars. I had to do much less than I thought and with the VIP expedited process, I was blown away. EXCEEDED my expectations.The only constructive feedback was around having to scan each passport page. While they were clear that images weren't going to be accepted, it was on my to make sure I read and followed those instructions. If they looked at my initial scan (with images) sooner, I would have saved a little time. That said, that is a ME issue not them. But had they looked at it originally when I placed the order, I may not have a few day delay. Regardless, HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

title: Excellent service.
text: Excellent service.Overall the process was very smooth and seamless. The company provided exactly what they said they would in the expected time frame. The online portal for uploading documents was slightly clunky at first, but once you got over that hurdle it was a really easy process and am very happy I used this service.

title: e-residence.com Very Effective
text: The process through e-residence.com is unbelievably simple and straightforward.  Application took minutes and the NIF was achieved in a matter of two days.  e-residence.com is highly recommended!

title: The only way to do your NIE at Madrid
text: If you’re moving to Madrid, it is pratically impossible to book an appointment for a NIE - and I’m sure it is also due to this “market” created by agencies like this one. Still, I had an urgent need to do my NIE and they delivered it within seven work days, so I’m grateful for it and for how easy the online process is. So my suggestion is: don’t waste your time booking in other cities (I got rejected in three places), or refreshing the website forever for an appointment in Madrid, and just pay e-residence to do it for you without any hassle.

title: Highly recommend this company
text: It was easy to go trough the whole prozess of applaying for my numero de seguridad social (España)I am really happy that I has choosen e-resicence.com The team was always very helpful and the process took even less days than offered on the website.

title: Excellent!

All online.

title: No NIF! Money back!
text: We started process of getting NIF for our son who’s not 18 yet. Not knowing that in this case we should apply and get NIF first we made a payment for the most basic package and waited. Few days later we’ve got contacted by rep. and asked few questions that brought us to conclusions that service for our son should be cancelled. They did cancel and within few days we got refund. Very trustworthy organization and well organized processes! 👍

title: RELIABLE! TRUE TO PROMISE
text: Got our NIF and NISS from them. and got them on time!! No hassle! Completely online. They also come true with their NIF guarantee. Got 1 day late from the option we paid and they partially refunded our account. They set expectations in our NISS clearly. and are very responsive whenever you reach out on the status of your application. Thank you! its a bliss dealing with your company.

title: Very Straightforward  and easy process and…

title: Perfect support and I would recommend to anyone
text: I tried requesting a NISS at the Seguraça Social for over 3 times and failed to get an adequate response. E-residence helped me by sending a lawyer to them in order to fix it in person for me. The response time on WhatsApp was perfect and the support team behind the service was friendly. I wouldn't be able to get the NISS without them!
